resources.string: It is the city of dreams. You are opening yourself to a world of wonderful opportunities. \n\nBut you need to be careful, this city can be intimidating tooâ€¦ Make the right choices and you just might end up living a dream life!

During game-play, you may face some challenges. Think wisely and then select the right option. With the correct option you will earn points and level up in the game or else will tumble down the ladder!
This game will help you improve your lifestyle by making the right lifestyle choices in the game and implementing them in the real life.
